1010010011001001 0110001101100110 1 -> sum: 0000100000110000, cout: 1

0011100000001001 1100010100101111 0 -> sum: 1111110100111000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
